mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectBill */ SELECT em.bill_id -- 안건 ID , em.bill_no -- 안건 번호 , em.bill_kind -- 의안 종류 (법률안/예산안 등) , em.na_term_cd -- 대수 코드 , em.bill_name_kg -- 의안명 - kg , em.bill_name_ru -- 의안명 - ru , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg,em.bill_name_ru,em.bill_name_kg,#{lang}) as bill_name -- 안건 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg,vum.member_nm_ru,vum.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , em.ppsl_knd_cd -- 제안자 종류 (정부/의원) , kgst.fngetcodenm('1005',em.ppsl_knd_cd,#{lang}) as ppsl_knd_nm , em.ppsr_id -- 발의자 아이디 , em.ppsl_dt -- 제안일 , em.gvrn_trsf_dt -- 정부 이송일 , em.prmg_dt -- 공포일자 , em.prmg_no -- 공포 번호 , em.reg_id -- 등록자 아이디 , em.reg_dt -- 등록 일자 , em.rcp_dt -- 안건접수일자 , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.etc_kg,em.etc_ru,em.etc_kg,#{lang}) as etc -- 비고 , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , ebs.stat_cd , kgst.fngetbillprogress(ebs.stat_cd) as progress_value FROM ebs_master em join view_user_member vum on (em.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) join ebs_bp_instance ebi on (em.bill_id = ebi.bill_id) join ebs_bp_step ebs on (ebs.step_id = ebi.current_step_id and ebs.bp_df_id = ebi.bp_df_id) where em.bill_id = #{billId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectListBillCmt */ SELECT em.bill_id -- 안건 아이디 , emc.cmt_cd -- 위원회 아이디 , emc.reg_dt as submit_dt -- 회부일 , emc.cmt_cd , emc.cmt_se_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1018',emc.cmt_se_cd,#{lang}) as cmt_se_nm , kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1,cd.dept_nm2,cd.dept_nm3,#{lang}) as dept_nm from kgst.ebs_master em join kgst.ebs_master_cmt emc on (em.bill_id = emc.bill_id) join kgst.com_dept cd on (emc.cmt_cd = cd.dept_cd) where em.bill_id = #{billId} order by emc.cmt_se_cd, emc.cmt_cd

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectListCmtMeeting */ select em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , em.dept_cd , kgst.fngetdeptnm(em.dept_cd,#{lang}) as dept_nm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , em.due_dtm , ema.bill_id , ema.rslt_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1008',ema.rslt_cd,#{lang}) as rslt_nm , ( select kgst.fngetcodenm('1018',cmt_se_cd,#{lang}) from ebs_master_cmt where bill_id = ema.bill_id and cmt_cd = em.dept_cd ) as cmt_se_nm from ebs_mtng em join ebs_mtng_agenda ema on (em.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id) where ema.bill_id = #{billId} and em.mtng_type_cd = '1' order by em.mtng_id

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectListMainMeeting */
select em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , em.dept_cd , kgst.fngetdeptnm(em.dept_cd,#{lang}) as dept_nm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , em.due_dtm , ema.bill_id , ema.rslt_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1009',ema.rslt_cd,#{lang}) as rslt_nm from ebs_mtng em join ebs_mtng_agenda ema on (em.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id) where ema.bill_id = #{billId} and em.mtng_type_cd = '2' order by em.mtng_id

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectListPartyMeeting */ select em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , em.dept_cd , kgst.fngetdeptnm(em.dept_cd,#{lang}) as dept_nm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , em.due_dtm , ema.bill_id , ema.rslt_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1008',ema.rslt_cd,#{lang}) as rslt_nm from ebs_mtng em join ebs_mtng_agenda ema on (em.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id) where ema.bill_id = #{billId} and em.mtng_type_cd = '3' order by em.mtng_id

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectListBillEtcInfo */ select emd.seq , emd.bill_id , emd.cls_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(emd.rmrk_kg,emd.rmrk_ru,emd.rmrk_kg,#{lang}) as rmrk , emd.rmrk_kg , emd.rmrk_ru , emd.mtn_dt , emd.prsd_rjct_dt , emd.lgl_rvw_rslt_code , kgst.fngetcodenm('1019',emd.lgl_rvw_rslt_code,#{lang}) as lgl_rvw_rslt_nm , emd.lgl_act_rslt_code , kgst.fngetcodenm('1020',emd.lgl_act_rslt_code,#{lang}) as lgl_act_rslt_nm , emd.rslt_dt , emd.reg_id , emd.reg_dt , emd.rslt_code , emd.reg_id , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.user_nm_kg,vum.user_nm_ru,vum.user_nm_kg,#{lang}) as regNm from kgst.ebs_master_detail emd join kgst.view_user_member vum on (emd.reg_id = vum.user_id) where bill_id = #{billId}
and emd.cls_cd = #{clsCd}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectListMettingResultFile */ select emf.seq , emf.mtng_id , emf.org_file_id , emf.org_file_nm , emf.pdf_file_id , emf.pdf_file_nm , emf.file_kind_cd , emf.file_size , emf.reg_id , emf.reg_dt from ebs_mtng_file emf where delete_yn = 'N' and mtng_id = #{mtngId} order by seq

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billAll.repository.BillAllMapper.selectListBillEtcFile2 */ select emd.bill_id , emd.dept_cd , emd.cls_cd , ef.org_file_id , ef.org_file_nm , ef.pdf_file_id , ef.pdf_file_nm , ef.detail_seq from ebs_master_detail emd join ebs_file ef on (emd.seq = ef.detail_seq) where ef.detail_seq = #{detailSeq} and ef.delete_yn = 'N'
